mapper.select: SELECT auctionNo, userNo, title, publisher, image, info, regiDate, endDate, state, bidprice, price AS immediPrice, genreNo FROM Auction WHERE endDate > sysdate and state = 'open'

SELECT auctionNo, userNo as "user.userNo", title, publisher, image, info, regiDate, endDate, state, bidPrice, price as immediPrice, genreNo FROM Auction WHERE auctionNo = #{auctionNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Auction (auctionNo, userNo, title, publisher, image, info, regiDate, endDate, state, bidPrice, price, genreNo) VALUES (#{auctionNo}, #{user.userNo}, #{title}, #{publisher}, #{image}, #{info}, #{regiDate}, #{endDate}, #{state}, #{bidPrice}, #{immediPrice}, #{genreNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE Auction SET info = #{info}, endDate = #{endDate}, state = #{state}, price = #{immediPrice}, genreNo = #{genreNo}, bidPrice = #{bidPrice} WHERE auctionNo = #{auctionNo}
